article_title: Bernie Sanders to Larry David: Come join on me campaign trail!
article_text:
Topics: Bernie Sanders, Editor's Picks, Elections 2016, larry david, Saturday Night Live, This Week, Innovation News, Entertainment News

Bernie Sanders has a pretty good sense of humor. He responded to Larry David’s “Saturday Night Live” impression of him by telling George Stephanopoulos on “This Week” that he’d like to take him out campaigning with him.

“I think we’ll use Larry at our next rally. He does better than I do,” Sanders said.

“He seems to have nailed you!” Stephanopoulos marvels.

Watch “SNL’s” brilliant parody of the first Democratic debate here.

And watch Sanders on “This Week” here.

article_metadata.description: Take your "SNL" impression out on the road with me, Sanders says on "This Week"
